title: 3 and Out Weekend Mailbag - Niners, Steelers, Giants, Falcons, Browns + More
itunes:title: 3 and Out Weekend Mailbag - Niners, Steelers, Giants, Falcons, Browns + More
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including who’s in the wrong in the public beef between Jevon Kinlaw and a Niners reporter, if Daniel Jones can turn around his career under the new Giants regime, if Kenny Pickett can win early with the help of the Steelers culture, if the Falcons are close to turning the corner with Arthur Smith, why no team is trading for Baker, and why Bill Belichick can’t draft wide receivers.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
